eu.amidst.huginlink.inference

Class HuginInferenceForDBN

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.huginlink.inference.HuginInferenceForDBN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithmForDBN

    public class HuginInferenceForDBN
extends Object
implements InferenceAlgorithmForDBN
    This class provides an interface to perform inference over Dynamic Bayesian networks using the Hugin inference engine.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DynamicBayesianNetwork amidstDBN
      Represents the Dynamic Bayesian network model in AMIDST format.
      COM.hugin.HAPI.Domain domainObject
      Represnts the expanded dynamic model over which the inference is performed.
      COM.hugin.HAPI.Class huginDBN
      Represents the Dynamic Bayesian network model in Hugin format.
      static int timeWindow
      Represnts the number of time slices in which the model is expanded.

      • amidstDBN

        public DynamicBayesianNetwork amidstDBN

      • huginDBN

        public COM.hugin.HAPI.Class huginDBN
        Represents the Dynamic Bayesian network model in Hugin format.

      • domainObject

        public COM.hugin.HAPI.Domain domainObject
        Represnts the expanded dynamic model over which the inference is performed.

      • timeWindow

        public static final int timeWindow
        Represnts the number of time slices in which the model is expanded. For now, we assume a timeWindow equals to 1.
